entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
